name: Numberline 2
description:
NumberLine 2 is the continuation of the popular (no.) puzzle.
You must repeat the indicated image from the numbers. But it isn't so easy - you can create only blocks with a "1". Fortunately, the numbers interact with each other. You can only create a block with a "1", but when you create it, the numbers on all adjacent blocks are incremented by 1.

Pleasant soundtrack, beautiful design and low level of complexity will help you to relax, and high level of complexity - strain the gyrations.Features
  • Pleasant soundtrack
  • Futuristic design
  • Simple but addictive gameplay
  • Achievements
  • Steam Trading Cards
  • Low price
